tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SLA_Management (
    SLA_ID SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    Client_ID INT NOT NULL,
    Vendor_ID INT NOT NULL,
    SLA_Type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    SLA_Description TEXT,
    Start_Date DATE,
    End_Date DATE,
    Compliance_Status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE Clients (
    client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_name VARCHAR(255),
    client_address VARCHAR(255),
    client_phone VARCHAR(20),
    client_email VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Vendors (
    vendor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_name VARCHAR(255),
    vendor_type VARCHAR(50),
    vendor_address VARCHAR(255),
    vendor_phone VARCHAR(20),
    vendor_email VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE service_level_agreements (
  sla_id INT NOT NULL,
  client_id INT NOT NULL,
  vendor_id INT NOT NULL,
  service_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  end_date DATE NOT NULL,
  status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'Active',
  PRIMARY KEY (sla_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES clients(client_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id) REFERENCES vendors(vendor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SLAs (
    sla_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT,
    vendor_id INT,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    agreed_service VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    penalty_clause VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES Clients(client_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id) REFERENCES Vendors(vendor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Compliance (
    compliance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sla_id INT,
    compliance_date DATE NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    remarks TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (sla_id) REFERENCES SLAs(sla_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Clients (
  client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  address VARCHAR(255),
  contact_person VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE
)

CREATE TABLE Vendors (
  vendor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vendor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  address VARCHAR(255),
  contact_person VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE
)

CREATE TABLE SLAs (
  sla_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_id INT,
  vendor_id INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  status VARCHAR(20) CHECK (status IN ('Active', 'Inactive')),
  CONSTRAINT fk_sla_client FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES Clients(client_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_sla_vendor FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id) REFERENCES Vendors(vendor_id)
)

CREATE TABLE SLARequirements (
  requirement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sla_id INT,
  description TEXT,
  priority INT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_requirement_sla FOREIGN KEY (sla_id) REFERENCES SLAs(sla_id)
)

CREATE TABLE SLACompliance (
  compliance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  requirement_id INT,
  compliance_status VARCHAR(20) CHECK (compliance_status IN ('Met', 'Not Met')),
  compliance_date DATE,
  CONSTRAINT fk_compliance_requirement FOREIGN KEY (requirement_id) REFERENCES SLARequirements(requirement_id)
)
